snippet: A judge refused to revise a plea offer to a former PTA treasurer accused of embezzling $82,000 from her daughter’s school.
lead_paragraph: A judge refused to revise a plea offer to a former PTA treasurer accused of embezzling $82,000 from her daughter’s school.

headline.main: Plea Deal in PTA Theft Case Stalls Over Terms of Restitution
headline.print_headline: Plea Deal in PTA Theft Case Stalls Over Terms of Restitution
headline.seo: PTA Theft Case Repayment Stalls Plea Deal
